column2: Virtus Total Return Fund Inc. (the Fund), formerly Virtus Global Dividend & Income Fund Inc., is a closed-end, diversified management investment company. The Fund's investment objective is to seek total return, consisting of capital appreciation and income. The Fund invests approximately 60% of its total assets in equity securities, managed by Duff & Phelps Investment Management Co. The Fund invests 40% in fixed income, managed by Newfleet Asset Management, LLC. The Fund also pursues an options overlay strategy, managed by Rampart Investment Management Company, LLC. The Fund invests in consumer discretionary, financials, healthcare, industrials, consumer staples, telecommunication services and utilities sectors.
